attributes.action: Stop the abuse of air conditioning
attributes.background:
UK is a cold country and air conditioning is not needed.
The constant abuse of air conditioning
. is an insult to all the foreigners that come from warmer countries
. affects people's health causing fever and cold even in summer
. is a waste of energy that negatively impact the environment

rejection.details:
It is clear from your petition that you are concerned about the use of air conditioning in the UK. But it is not clear what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to address your concerns.

If you would like legislation to regulate the use of air conditioning in the UK, you could start a petition asking for that.  

Please also note that you will need to include your full name for us to be able to accept your petition.
